pnm.pnm.open_pnm_file(filename, *args, **kwargs)¶

A context manager for opening PNM files

Accepts the same arguments as open

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – filename

  • args – open args

  • kwargs – open kwargs

Returns:

pnm.pnm.read_pnm(file)¶

Read a PNM file

Parameters:

file (file-like object) – the file to read

Returns:

(image, maxval)

Return type:

(ndarray, int)

pnm.pnm.write_pnm(image, max_val, file)¶

Write a PNM file

Parameters:

  • max_val (int) – maxval

  • file – the file to write to

Returns:

None

Return type:

None
